name: uibuilder/jQuery Example - Read-me
info:
This is an example of using jQuery with
uibuilder. It shows how the 2 libraries can 
work together.

However, it is worth noting that jQuery no 
longer gives you many advantages over plain 
HTML and JavaScript, especially when using  the 
helper functions in the uibuilder modern front 
end library.

Update for uibuilder v6.1.0

## Configuration

Install jQuery via the uibuilder configuration
panel.

Then update the files:

* `index.html`
* `index.js`

From the two comment nodes included.

---

A version of this example is also in the 
uibuilder [WIKI](https://github.com/TotallyInformation/node-red-contrib-uibuilder/wiki/Example:-JQuery).

name: index.html
info:
